name: Hyper ship
description:
Controls:

  1. Use "A" & "D" to move.

Concept:The objective is to keep the ship on the bright line, otherwise a timer will decrease until it reaches 0, destroying the ship in the process. When the player returns to the line, the timer stops, but does not return to its original value.

The aim of the game is to reach the final goal while obtaining the highest possible score!

The game has a save system so you can save the Score after each run! After being saved, the score can be seen from the menu.
